The build artifacts are hosted in the Sonatype OSS maven repository.  Releases are mirrored to the Maven central repository.

Some notes to myself on how to get this thing published:


{{{mvn deploy}}}

{{{
mvn release:prepare -Dusername=username@gmail.com -Dpassword=xxxxxxx -Darguments=-Dgpg.passphrase=xxxxxx

mvn release:perform -Dusername=username@gmail.com -Dpassword=xxxxxxx -Darguments=-Dgpg.passphrase=xxxxxx
}}}
